name: Han's Toolkit
Lore: 'Experienced pilots keep a well equipped toolkit. Horizontal boosters, alluvial dampers and hydrospanners aid in performing high-tech repairs aboard starships.',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to deploy on one of you characters, vehicles or starships (free on Falcon or Han). While aboard a vehicle or starship, you may use 1 Force to cancel any Interrupt or Effect of any kind which targets that vehicle or starship.',
